name: Zombie Mutant DNA
description:
Zombie Mutant DNA is a retro style top-down shooter. Focused on action-packed zombie shooting fun. Travel through a post-apocalyptic world infested with mutated monsters. Acquire new weapons, fight epic boss battles, and discover hidden secrets.

THE INFECTION

The world has gone crazy! City streets are filled with roaming zombie hordes. The only alternative we have left is to fight back!


AWESOME FIREPOWER

Pick up new weapons, ammunition and other equipment as you progress.

  • Blast zombies with your shotgun!
  • Use extremely accurate sniper rifle at longer ranges.
  • Flamethrower can set multiple zombies on fire at once.
  • Rocket launcher and hand grenades for the moments you need some serious firepower!
  • And many other weapons!
